mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, POSITION_NAME, MANAGER_NAME, USER_NAME, USER_ID, USER_PWD, EMAIL, SALARY, BONUS, PHONE, GENDER, ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_CHANGEPATH, IMAGE_ORIGINPATH, BIRTHDAY, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, PHONE, ADDRESS ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.USER_NO, m.USER_ID, m.USER_NAME, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.ADDRESS, m.BIRTHDAY, m.IMAGE_CHANGEPATH, m.IMAGE_ORIGINPATH, p.POSITION_NAME, b.BUSINESS_NAME FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN POSITION p ON m.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO LEFT JOIN BUSINESS b ON m.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO WHERE m.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT m1.USER_NAME AS managerName FROM MEMBER m JOIN MEMBER m1 ON m.MANAGER_NO = m1.USER_NO WHERE m.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, IMAGE_CHANGEPATH = #{imageChangePath}, IMAGE_ORIGINPATH = #{imageOriginPath}, POSITION_NO = #{positionNo}, BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo}, MODIFY_DATE = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE (#{businessName} IS NULL OR BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName}) AND (#{positionName} IS NULL OR POSITION_NAME = #{positionName}) AND (#{enrollDate} IS NULL OR CREATE_DATE = #{enrollDate}) ORDER BY USER_NO DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE (#{businessName} IS NULL OR BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName}) AND (#{positionName} IS NULL OR POSITION_NAME = #{positionName}) AND (#{enrollDate} IS NULL OR CREATE_DATE = #{enrollDate})
